Requesting the following information: 1. Provide The number of mute swans removed  and the location from which they were removed from all state-managed land in Michigan from the year 2004 through April 30, 2012;    a. Provide who,  the DNR, USDA, FWS, or other agencies qualified, removed the mute swans from all state-managed land in Michigan from the year 2004 through April 30, 2012; and        b. Provide the method by which the mute swans were killed from each location on state-managed land in Michigan from the year 2004 through April 30, 2012. 2. Provide the nest locations, total number of eggs and nests destroyed or removed, and the total cygnets hatched on STATE-managed land from 2004 through April 30, 2012; 3. The number of mute swan removal permits issued, along with permit locations, to include city or Township location if address of location is not permitted,  including but not limited to,  private residences, lake associations, governmental units and businesses, from 2004 to April 30, 2012; 4. Provide the number of mute swans removed from, including but not limited to, all private, residential, public, business and local government-owned Michigan land, along with the locations, to include city or township if address of location is not permitted,  of each removal, and who, The DNR, USDA, FWS, or other agency qualified to remove mute swans from each location from 2004 through April 30, 2012; 5. Provide the nest location sites, number of eggs destroyed or removed per site, and the total number hatched per site, including but not limited to, all private, residential, public, business and government-owned land  from the year 2004 through April 30, 2012;   6. Provide the number, per year, of mute swans who died while in the care of Michigan rehabilitator from the year 2000 through 2011; 7. Provide the number of mute swans killed by live capture and euthanized, shot individually, to include but not BE limited to, on roadside and on lakes, injection by euthanasia drugs, carbon dioxide inhalation, cervical dislocation, capture by Alpha Chloralose, killed by cars, and killed by unknown means, per year, in Michigan from 2004 THROUGH 2011, and per month for the year 2012, through April 30, 2012; 8. Provide the total number of mute swans culled by the DNR, USDA, FWS, or other agencies qualified  to remove mute swans from state, public and private lands in Michigan from the year 2004 to 2012, and per month for the year 2012 through April 30, 2012; and 9. Provide the location and the method used at each location where culls were performed on state, public and private lands in Michigan from the year 2004 to 2012, and per month for the year 2012 through April 30, 2012.
